title: WHO Director-General Condemns Comments About Using Africa as Coronavirus Vaccine Testing Ground
description: At a World Health Organization news conference, Director-General Dr. Tedros Adhanom addresses comments made recently by some scientists that Africa would be a testing ground for a coronavirus vaccine. "Africa cannot and will not be a testing ground for any vaccine. We will follow all the rules to test any vaccine or therapueutics all over the world," Dr. Tedros says. He goes on to condemn the comments, saying it was "a disgrace" and "appalling."
